tool_description: This is an API to retrieve live URLs related to climate changes,  science and environment all around the globe
name: Climate Crisis
title: Climate Crisis

api_list.name: Get Climate Change News from specific resource
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back news about Climate Change using the desired newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-crisis.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-crisis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-crisis.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspapername}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-crisis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Full Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Climate Changes

api_list.name: Get Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back news about Climate Change using times, guardian and telegraph newspapers mainly
